      • addCurlMesh

        Adds CurlMesh to this renderer.

      • getPageRect

        public RectF getPageRect(int page)
        Returns rect reserved for left or right page. Value page should be PAGE_LEFT or PAGE_RIGHT.

        Change background/clear color.

      • setMargins

        public void setMargins(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Set margins or padding. Note: margins are proportional. Meaning a value of .1f will produce a 10% margin.

      • setViewMode

        public void setViewMode(int viewmode)
        Sets visible page count to one or two. Should be either SHOW_ONE_PAGE or SHOW_TWO_PAGES.

      • translate

        public void translate(PointF pt)
        Translates screen coordinates into view coordinates.
